TEXT.TITLE: CBT METALS/FINANCIALS DELIVERY LOCATIONS
TEXT.BODY: The following deliveries are scheduled for April 8 against Chicago Baord of Trade Futures - Silver - 33 lots at Chicago, Illinois. Kilo Gold - one lot at Chicago, Illinois. Reuter
